meta.description: Minimize total pollution from transporting goods using motorcycles, small trucks, and large trucks.

params.name: pollution
params.description: Pollution units produced per trip for each mode.

params.name: capacity
params.description: Product units transported per trip for each mode.

vars.name: trips
vars.description: Number of trips for each mode.

vars.name: use_mode
vars.description: Binary variable indicating if a mode is used.

objective.name: min_total_pollution
objective.description: Minimize the total pollution from all trips.

constraints.name: mode_selection_limit
constraints.description: The company can only choose two modes of transportation.

constraints.name: motorcycle_trip_limit
constraints.description: The number of motorcycle trips cannot exceed 8.

constraints.name: product_transport_requirement
constraints.description: The company needs to transport at least 300 units of products.

constraints.name: total_trip_limit
constraints.description: The total number of trips must be less than or equal to 20.

constraints.name: mode_usage_link_motorcycle
constraints.description: Linking trips and mode usage for motorcycles.

constraints.name: mode_usage_link_small_truck
constraints.description: Linking trips and mode usage for small trucks.

constraints.name: mode_usage_link_large_truck
constraints.description: Linking trips and mode usage for large trucks.
